reviews.title: First Review!
reviews.body:
As a long time player of the original Arknights, I am crazy excited for Endfield.

Hope itâ€™s amazing!

reviews.title: a "great" way to launch game with pre-release grind.
reviews.body: what should've been the exciting lead-up to the launch of this game turned into a cynical several-weeks-long chore with daily claiming the resources and drawing the rewards for the game that still had eternity to be released. log in daily to click buttons, collect trivial resources. it was not a preview, but a tedious obligation that killed my interest before it even has been released. thank you for "rewarding the community"
reviews.body_cleaned: what should've been the exciting lead-up to the launch of this game turned into a cynical several-weeks-long chore with daily claiming the resources and drawing the rewards for the game that still had eternity to be released. log in daily to click buttons, collect trivial resources. it was not a preview, but a tedious obligation that killed my interest before it even has been released. thank you for "rewarding the community"

reviews.title: Wonâ€™t work :(
reviews.body: Iâ€™ve been waiting for this game for a while and Iâ€™m glad itâ€™s finally here. But every time I try to open the app, it crashes. Iâ€™ve tried everything, Iâ€™ve re-set my iPad, re-set the app, deleted and re-downloaded the app, but nothing has worked. I donâ€™t know if this is a bug, but if it is, please fix it! (Btw from what Iâ€™ve seen, the graphics look amazing!)
reviews.body_cleaned: Iâ€™ve been waiting for this game for a while and Iâ€™m glad itâ€™s finally here. But every time I try to open the app, it crashes. Iâ€™ve tried everything, Iâ€™ve re-set my iPad, re-set the app, deleted and re-downloaded the app, but nothing has worked. I donâ€™t know if this is a bug, but if it is, please fix it! (Btw from what Iâ€™ve seen, the graphics look amazing!)
